title: seoincorporation
author: seoincorporation
content: Some weeks ago i started my Cryptonews site called Cryptotalk.tech, the idea wasn't to collect the news from the main News sources and pot them in 1 site, and i did it with RSS Feed. On the end of each post, i add the Autor and the Source to make it fair for all. While i was working in the project i asked to the community what would they change in the site, and you can see all the implemented ideas on this thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5466125.0And some users asked me if i could create a post about their services, that's why yesterday i finished the new section called Community Projects. Where the idea is to have an area where users can find project made by the cripto community on this forum.How it works?1.- Go to https://cryptotalk.tech/community/2.- Fill all the data:Code:-Your name-Your email-Your Website-Article Title-Author-Image Link -Article Boddy-Your Social Networks / comments3.- SubmitSimple right? i will verify the data, and if the project looks legit i will make the post and let the user know after this get's done.This is a free service, and if you have any questions please let me know.News Site: https://cryptotalk.tech/Telegram bot: https://t.me/cryptotalktech

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Congratulations on the service you have launched and welcome for the service announcement on the forum. And it is very interesting that the service is totally free. Now crypto products as well as crypto-related service provider will be able to promote their product/service without any cost.
